title: Handle Retailer Product Availability Inquiry
description: A retailer calls to ask about the current stock level and lead time for a specific product.

tasks.description: Identify the product the retailer is asking about using its SKU or name.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the product in the system.

tasks.description: Check the real-time inventory level for the product.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds there are 500 units currently in stock.

tasks.description: Check for any incoming shipments of the product from suppliers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a shipment of 1000 more units is expected to arrive in 5 days.

tasks.description: Inform the retailer of the current stock level and the expected arrival of the next shipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the availability information to the customer.
